data.title: Darkness becomes her
data.meta_description: The Millennium trilogy thrust Noomi Rapace into the arms of Hollywood, but we won’t see the actress in a rom com anytime soon.
data.text:
Noomi Rapace is quite the enigma. The 30- year-old Swede was perhaps born to play the iconic Lisbeth Salander in the screen version of Stieg Larsson’s best-selling Millennium trilogy of books, even if today she has discarded the nose ring and tattoos and adopted Gothic designer chic.

On the surface Rapace (above) is forthcoming, outgoing and very happy to be seated alongside her actor husband, Ola, 38, who had been famous in Sweden long before her for his role in the hit TV series Brotherhood and on stage at the Royal Dramatic Theatre.
